text: Taqiyya is sinning for a pious cause in some forms of Islam. Sunnis believe that Taqiyya is only done for ones own safety but Shias also believe that taqiyya can be done any time as long as it is for a pious cause. Taqiyya is commonly used by in attacks of terrorism using misinterpretations of the Qur'an and hadith. == References == Category:Arabic words and phrases Category:Islam
title: Taqiyya
